channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Monthly news - July 2023
item.description:
Microsoft 365 DefenderMonthly newsJuly 2023 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month across our Defender products. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from June 2023.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcast (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External
Product improvements
Previews / Announcements
Microsoft 365 Defender
Prevent repeat attacks with threat-informed security posture recommendations. Microsoft 365 Defender now make...
